ChallengeHex decoder
Submitter0xe82d5b10ad98d34...
Submitted at2018-05-10
Gas used3010659
pragma solidity 0.4.24;

contract HexDecoder {
    function decode(string input) public pure returns(bytes) {
        bytes memory output = new bytes(bytes(input).length/2);
        uint p;
        uint j;
        uint16[36] memory letters = [1024, 1040, 1056, 1072, 1088, 1104, 1120, 1136, 1152, 1168, 1184, 1200, 1216, 1232, 1248, 1264, 1280, 1296, 1312, 1328, 1344, 1360, 1376, 1392, 1408, 1424, 1440, 1456, 1472, 1488, 1504, 1520, 1536, 1552, 1568, 1584];
        for (uint i = 0; i < bytes(input).length; i = i+2) {
            if (bytes(input)[i] >= 97) {
                // a -> 97
                p = letters[uint(bytes(input)[i]) - 87];
            } else if (bytes(input)[i] >= 65) {
                // A -> 65
                p = (uint(bytes(input)[i]) + 9) * 16;
            } else {
                // 0 -> 48
                p = letters[uint(bytes(input)[i]) - 48];
            }

            if (bytes(input)[i+1] >= 97) {
                output[j] = byte(p + (uint(bytes(input)[i+1]) - 87));
            } else if (bytes(input)[i+1] >= 65) {
                output[j] = byte(p + (uint(bytes(input)[i+1]) - 55));
            } else {
                output[j] = byte(p + (uint(bytes(input)[i+1]) - 48));
            }
            j++;
        }
        return output;
    }
}

// 0xE82D5B10ad98d34dF448b07a5a62C1aFfBEf758F
